typographies.tuto_step_1: 1. Look at the map to locate the boxes.
typographies.tuto_step_2: 2. Find a QR code and scan it!
typographies.tuto_step_3: 3. Discover if you've won a prize.
typographies.tuto_step_4: 4. Redeem your prize and receive the physical item at home

alerts.game_validity: Valid while supplies last and until June 30, 2024.
